frame.name: Sacrificing_for
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> sacrifices an (often abstract) <fen>Asset</fen> in exchange for a <fen>Benefit</fen> which is deemed better or more worth having.
<ex><fex name="age">We</fex> never <t>sacrifice</t> <fex name="ass">quality</fex> <fex name="ben">for price</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="ass">What</fex> are <fex name="age">you</fex> willing to <t>sacrifice</t> <fex name="ben">to get a chance at winning</fex>?</ex>
<ex><fex name="age">Most people in that position</fex> probably would have <t>compromised</t> <fex name="ass">their principles</fex>. <fex name="ben">INI</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> gives up the <fen>Asset</fen> in hopes of receiving a greater <fen>Benefit</fen>.
<ex><fex name="age">We</fex> never <t>sacrifice</t> quality for price.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Asset
FE.definition:
<def-root>The item which is sacrificed by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex>We never <t>sacrifice</t> <fex name="ass">quality</fex> for price.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The way that the <fen>Agent</fen> sacrifices the <fen>Asset</fen>.
<ex>So many people <fex name="Manr">gladly</fex> <t>compromise</t> comfort to look more attractive.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>Duration denotes the length of time from the beginning of a continuous situation (the one denoted by the target) to its end. In many cases, the continuous situation is a dynamic action which is ongoing, while in others it is simply an undifferentiated state.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> gives up the <fen>Asset</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Tim">In wartime</fex> much was <t>compromised</t> in favor of security</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The reason for which the <fen>Agent</fen> gives up the <fen>Asset</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Benefit
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> hopes to receive or gain advantage from the <fen>Benefit</fen> as a result of giving up the <fen>Asset</fen>.
<ex>We never <t>sacrifice</t> quality <fex name="ben">for price</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: sacrifice.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: give up for a greater purpose.

lexUnit.name: compromise.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: give up or devalue in favor of something else.
